text:
"Blessed to have you and start all over again. Thank you baby for this baby.", wrote Arjun Rampal sharing the news that he and his girlfriend Gabriella Demetriades are expecting their first baby together.
Arjun Rampal is all set to embrace fatherhood again as he shared the news on social media with a monochrome picture, where she is seen flaunting her baby bump.
Ever since the couple announced the news, their fans and well-wishers have been pouring in congratulatory messages. The couple has been in a rock-steady relationship since a long time.
Even though neither of the two confessed or admitted to their relationship, their social media PDA and appearances together at events and parties said it all. Gabriella is a South African model and actress. She also made an appearance in Bollywood film Sonali Cable.
